reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.urls module¶

covid_help_service_app URL Configuration

The urlpatterns list routes URLs to views. For more information please see:

https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.1/topics/http/urls/

Examples: Function views

  1. Add an import: from my_app import views

  2. Add a URL to urlpatterns: path(‘’, views.home, name=’home’)

Class-based views

  1. Add an import: from other_app.views import Home

  2. Add a URL to urlpatterns: path(‘’, Home.as_view(), name=’home’)

Including another URLconf

  1. Import the include() function: from django.urls import include, path

  2. Add a URL to urlpatterns: path(‘blog/’, include(‘blog.urls’))

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views module¶

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.available_hospital_bed(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display the available hospital bed list.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page that display all the available entry

of hospital bed.

Return type

HttpResponse.

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.available_icu(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display the available ICU list.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page that display all the available entry

of the ICU.

Return type

HttpResponse.

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.confirm_booking_for_hospital_bed(request)[source]¶

This method is used to handle the hospital bed reservation, it takes data from the patient information form and confirm payment.finally it stores the hospital bed information and payment confirmations in the database.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns a form page of the patient details and payment confirmation page

of hospital bed. if the input is wrong it will show a wrong id massage.

Return type

HttpResponse.

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.confirm_booking_icu(request)[source]¶

This method is used to handle the ICU reservation, it takes data from the patient information form and confirm payment.finally it stores the ICU information and payment confirmations in the database.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns a form page of the patient details and payment confirmation page

of ICU. if the input is wrong it will show a wrong id massage.

Return type

HttpResponse.

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.deleted_hospital_bed(request)[source]¶

This method is used to delete the specific reserved hospital bed entry by ID and it changes the availability of that specific hospital bed entry in the available hospital bed database.finally it shows the confirmation of delete page.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns the page of confirmation of delete if the user is logged in.

else it will return the log in page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.deleted_icu(request)[source]¶

This method is used to delete the specific reserved ICU entry by ID and it changes the availability of that specific ICU entry in the available ICU database.finally it shows the confirmation of delete page.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns the page of confirmation of delete if the user is logged in.

else it will return the log in page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.reserve_page(request)[source]¶

This method is used to show the selection page of see available ICU and see available hospital bed. by clicking one of the option it shows the corresponding page.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page.It returns a page where it has two options.one is see available

ICU and see available hospital base pages.

Return type

HttpResponse.

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.see_reserve_icu(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display the reserved ICU list of that specific user.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page that display all the reserved ICU list if the user is

logged in. else it will return the log in page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.see_reserved_hospital_bed(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display the reserved Hospital bed list of that specific user.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page that display all the reserved ICU list if the user is logged in.

else it will return the log in page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.thank_you(request)[source]¶

This method is used to handle the request of confirm reservation of ICU page, it takes data from the form and modify the availability of that specific entry of the available ICU database and stores it in the booking ICU database.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns a thank you page when data

is successfully stored in data base.

Return type

HttpResponse.

reserve_icu_and_hospital_bed.views.thank_you_for_hospital_bed(request)[source]¶

This method is used to handle the request of confirm reservation of hospital bed page, it takes data from the form and modify the availability of that specific entry of the available hospital bed database and stores it in the booking hospital bed database.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns a thank you page when data

is successfully stored in data base.

Return type

HttpResponse.
